A lot of times I get asked how I got so lucky...
...and how I was able to start traveling the world.
However, the truth is relatively quite simple.
Two years ago, I made the decision to start chasing my dreams...
It was not easy and I had many doubts.
I worked many little jobs to save up and eventually I started traveling.
Even though the journey wasn't easy, I never looked back.
And deep down I believed that if there's something you're truly passionate about,...
And that if you keep chasing your dreams,...
...eventually all the pieces fall into place.
